00048 class GameStaticMovementState : public GameState {
00049         public:
00050                 //** Used for memory management, presets pointers to NULL.
00051                 GameStaticMovementState();
00052                 
00053                 //** Enforces memory safety by forcing the Cleanup function.
00054                 ~GameStaticMovementState();
00055 
00056                 //** Initializes the state using an external script.
00057     void Init( SDL_Surface* theDisplay = NULL, 
00058                const char* theScript = NULL );
00059 
00060                 //** Cleans up any leftover state assets, such as entities
00061                 void Cleanup();
00062 
00063                 //** Handles events that have been triggered by the player.
00064                 bool HandleEvents( PlatformEngine* game,
00065                                 SDL_Event& event );
00066 
00067                 //** Runs any new state logic necessary before continuing.
00068                 void Update( PlatformEngine* game );
00069 
00070                 //** Draws the state's entities to the display screen.
00071                 void Draw();
00072 
00073         private:
00074                 //** The background settings for this state.
00075                 GameMap* theMap;
00076 
00077                 //** The entity representing the player on this state.
00078                 GamePlayer* thePlayer;
00079 };
00080 
00081 } // namespace Platform
